name: PDFPrintScalingMode
desc: The type of scaling to be used when printing a page (see PDFDocument).

items.name: case pageScaleDownToFit
items.desc: Scale large pages down to fit the paper size (smaller pages do not get scaled up).

items.name: case pageScaleNone
items.desc: Do not apply scaling to the page when printing.

items.name: case pageScaleToFit
items.desc: Scale each page up or down to best fit the paper size.
